id: We Asked People About Their Craziest One-Night Stands
paragraph: One-night stands: We’ve all had them, and for the most part, we’ve all probably woken up regretting them. If nothing else, they can make for a pretty good story—so VICE’s Darlene Demorizi decided to ask a handful of folks in Brooklyn to tell her about theirs. She wound up hearing some pretty wild stuff, ranging from a woman who hooked up with a “maple syrup dude” to a guy who “met a stranger and smashed it in the park.” Sign up for our newsletter to get the best of VICE delivered to your inbox daily.
